summary: Christine, newly widowed and consumed by the memory of a ball she attended age 16, decides to track down the men she danced with that night and discover their fates.
cast: Harry Baur|Marie Bell|Pierre Blanchar|Fernandel|Louis Jouvet|Raimu|Françoise Rosay|Pierre Richard-Willm|Maurice Bénard|Pierre Alcover|Alfred Adam|Roger Legris|Henri Nassiet|Milly Mathis|René Génin|Andrex|Sylvie|Jeanne Fusier-Gir|Robert Lynen|Les Petits Chanteurs à la Croix de Bois|Jacques Beauvais|Peggy Bonny|Serge de Landauer|Georges Dorival|Crista Dorra|Marguerite Ducouret|Agnès Duval|Gabrielle Fontan|Simone Gauthier|Raymond Narlay|Henri Niel|Sylvain|Janine Zorelli
title: Carnet de baile
